医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
开源AI工具与领先的专有模型竞争医学诊断人工智能可以以多种方式改变医学，包括它对忙碌的临床医生充当可信赖的诊断助手的承诺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/open-source-ai-tool-competes-with-leading-propriperate-models-models-medinical-nin-Medial-diennning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/open-source-ai-tool-competes-with-leading-properiperare-models-in-medial-medical-nigical-negnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4062001-04A2-4E01-B926-49E34BDC48C5 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 23:41:00 -0400 Open-source AI tool competes with leading proprietary models in medical diagnosis
在放疗中添加化学疗法并不能改善宫颈癌患者的预后NRG肿瘤学GOG-0263 III期临床试验的结果是，在根治性的滞肌切除术和辅助放疗和淋巴结清切除术后，基于顺铂的化学疗法对患有早期，中等风险的宫颈癌的患者增加了化学疗法的辅助性疗法和淋巴结清扫术，这表明对患者的造成效果并没有提高患者的局限性，并增加了降低的患者毒性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/adding-chemotherapy-to-radiotherapy-does-does-not-improve-utcomes-for-cervical-cancer-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/adding-chemotherapy-to-radiotherapy-doeshapy-does-not-improve-utcomes-for-cervical-cancer-cancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97c7c7ed4e-e2fa-4294-B48B-86E090ABC2CD Fri, 14 Mar 2025 23:34:00 -0400 Adding chemotherapy to radiotherapy does not improve outcomes for cervical cancer patients
新的基于CRISPR的测试可检测不放大的多药耐药细菌生物工程教授和Grainger工程学院的院长拉希德·巴希尔（Rashid Bashir）领导了一个研究人员的一组项目，该项目导致了新技术，该技术可快速，高度敏感地检测到低浓度的多药耐药细菌和其他病原体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/new-crispr---test-test-test-detects-multi-drug--抗性 - 抗药性 - 透露 - without-amplification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/New-CRISPR-based-test-detects-multi-drug-resistant-bacteria-without-amplification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1A230C2D-975D-4633-9E8A-1D00DACA58CC Fri, 14 Mar 2025 19:17:00 -0400 New CRISPR-based test detects multi-drug-resistant bacteria without amplification

野外城市界面大火对健康危险比远程野火更为危险新的研究发现，通过野生世界界面（WUI）燃烧的大火中的烟雾比偏远地区的野火的烟雾更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/wildland-urban-interface-fires-fires-are-fires-are-far-more-danger------------------------------------------------- than-than-remote-wildfires.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/wildland-urban-interface-fires-fires-are-fires-are-far-more-danger--to-health-health-than-tan-tan-tan-remote-wildfires.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd2bde41-795E-450B-A7DC-33F49E24A3B6 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 18:58:00 -0400 Wildland-urban interface fires are far more dangerous to health than remote wildfires
研究揭开了异常蛋白质折叠模式背后的机制蛋白质是长分子，必须折叠成复杂的三维结构才能执行其细胞功能。这种折叠过程有时会出现问题，导致蛋白质错误折叠，如果无法纠正，可能会导致疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/study-unravels-mechanism-behind-unusual-protein-foldolding-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/study-unravels-mechanism-behind-behind-unusial-protein-foldolding-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6dac519-72a2-46b1-864c-e613a58cebc2 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 18:50:00 -0400 Study unravels mechanism behind unusual protein folding patterns

新的科学线索可以解锁导致神经退行性疾病的钥匙细胞途径在自然神经科学中，UConn医学学院研究人员揭示了一个新的科学线索，可以解锁关键的细胞途径，从而导致诸如阿尔茨海默氏病等毁灭性神经退行性疾病，以及对大脑额叶和颞叶的逐渐损害，额颞叶变性（FTD）和相关的疾病杂质散发scleriss scleriss corperissclorsissclorsissclorissclorissclorsisscliss（均为Scriss）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/new-scientific-clue-could-could-unlock-key-cey-cellular-cellular-pathway-pathway-newrular-pathway to-neuroDegenerative-diseasees.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/new-scientific-clue-cold-could-unlock-key-cellular-ceellular-cellular-pathway-pathway-newrular-pathway to-neuroDegenerative-diseasees.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb4bc4d4-840e-49E7-B47B-4BA-4BA6C0F79A2B Fri, 14 Mar 2025 18:37:00 -0400 New scientific clue could unlock key cellular pathway leading to neurodegenerative diseases
VCU研究确定了两个因素，可以帮助缩小自闭症求职者的招聘差距自闭症患者在寻找工作时经常面临艰苦的战斗，尤其是在面试中。新弗吉尼亚联邦大学研究强调了雇主神经多样性培训的持久价值，再加上候选人在招聘过程中对自闭症诊断的披露。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/vcu-research-indistif-two-factors-two-factors-that-c​​ould-help-close-the-hirp-close-the-hirg-for-for-for-otautistic-job-job-seekers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/vcu-research-indistifies-two-factors-two-factors-that-c​​ould-help-close-the-hiring-the-hiring-gap-for-for-autistic-job-job-job-seekers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5020C754-90C2-48EC-8162-D08CC5170B29 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 18:28:00 -0400 VCU research identifies two factors that could help close the hiring gap for autistic job seekers
通过重新激活天然RNA杀伤开关来打击癌症的新方法替代的RNA剪接就像是电影编辑器的剪裁和重新排列场景，从同一镜头创建了不同版本的电影。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/new-apphach-combat-combat-combat-cancer-by-reactivation-natural-rna-kill-kill-kill-switch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/new-apphacch-combat-combat-combat-cancer-by-reactivation-natural-rna-kill-kill-kill-kill-switch.aspx.comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07D9BBBF-598E-47771-4771-AFFF-9BF7F7F0AA9A28 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 18:20:00 -0400 New approach to combat cancer by reactivating natural RNA kill switch
